title: renovated, centrally located 2 Bed/1 Bath apartment in Dania Beach.
posting_body: ['Beautifully renovated, centrally located 2 Bed/1 Bath apartment in Dania Beach.', 'Unit features new floors, a new kitchen, new appliances, new lighting, new A/C’s, and a newly renovated bathroom.', 'Rent includes parking and garbage removal.', 'Freshly painted and ready for occupancy.', '$29 Online Application required along with proof of income for previous 2 months (upload pay stubs to application).', 'First Month, Last Month, & Security Deposit to move-in.', 'Tenant income must be at least three times the rent amount to be approved.', 'FOR   AVAILABILITY  AND LANDLORD REQUIEMENTS   PLEASE   TEXT  YOUR  EMAIL  ALONG  WITH  A     SCREENSHOT  OF  THIS  POST.', 'TEXT: ADMIN.', 'Maria A', 'show contact info', 'THANK YOU', 'David E Miller', 'Lic.', 'Real Estate Broker', 'show contact info']
